name: Spinach Mushroom Omelet
author: Dragonfly
summary: A hearty but healthy breakfast or brunch omelet, filled with cheese, mushrooms, spinach, and peppers. Serve with a slice of whole grain toast and fruit.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons finely chopped red bell pepper
directions: Beat egg and egg whites in a small bowl
Mix in Parmesan cheese, Cheddar cheese, salt, red pepper flakes, garlic powder, nutmeg, and pepper
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir mushrooms, green onion, and bell pepper until tender, about 5 minutes
Place spinach in skillet and cook until just wilted
Stir in diced tomato and egg mixture; as eggs set, lift edges, letting uncooked portion flow underneath
Cook until egg mixture sets, 10 to 15 minutes; cut into wedges and serve immediately
